name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Slack in Browser, not App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Slack in Browser, not App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slack Browser Redirect Extension

Use Slack directly in your Chrome browser without installing the desktop app. 
This extension automatically redirects Slack links to your browser, eliminating annoying prompts like "Opening link in Slack..." and "Download Slack for Desktop." 
Save system resources and stay productive by keeping all your Slack activities within Chrome. 
Simply install the extension and enjoy a seamless Slack experience without extra downloads.


スラックのリンクをブラウザで開くとappを開こうとしてきます。
このextensionはappを開くことなくブラウザのままリンクに飛ぶようにするだけのシンプルな拡張機能です。


https://github.com/yumebayashi/Open-Slack-in-Browser-not-App
